With Currys buyout, China's JD.com could get hungered short-cut to Europe expansionIf JD.com does acquire British electronics retailer Currys , the Chinese ecommerce giant JD.com would get the store and warehouse network it needs to expand rapidly in the UK and Europe, at a bargain-basement price. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 11:19:36 GMT DQTA6U62OFLPBEC2KYZXZHHB4 https://www.reuters.com/business/retail-consumer/with-currys-buyout-chinas-jdcom-could-get-hungered-short-cut-europe-expansion-2024-02-21/Casey Hall, Sophie Yu, Helen Reid可持续发展可持续财务与报告

Chinese, Indian militaries hold 'constructive' meeting on border issues - ministryThe Chinese and Indian militaries held a constructive meeting on resolving border issues on Monday, China's defence ministry said in a statement. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 10:32:33 GMT X4BMTRKY7VK3BCZ336GE4EVYXI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/chinese-indian-militaries-hold-constructive-meeting-border-issues-ministry-2024-02-21/Reuters世界亚太地区
Russia is biggest security threat to NATO-hopeful Sweden, security service saysRussia is the main international security threat to Sweden, and foreign enemies may try to exploit an elevated risk of extremist violence from Islamists and the far right, the Swedish security service said on Wednesday. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 10:26:13 GMT XSYA26G2CVOLJLHIPMAQJTET5I https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-is-biggest-security-threat-nato-hopeful-sweden-security-service-says-2024-02-21/Reuters世界欧洲
Red Sea ballistic missile attacks trigger Asian interest in defencesThe use of anti-ship ballistic missiles (ASBMs) in the Red Sea has spurred interest in Asia about the systems used to shoot them down, experts and industry officials say - although China, with its huge ASBM arsenal, presents a tougher challenge. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 09:39:05 GMT U6425OGZPZOB3E2A7SQBPUVUME https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/red-sea-ballistic-missile-attacks-trigger-asian-interest-defences-2024-02-21/Gerry Doyle世界亚太地区
On frontline Taiwan islands, fishermen wary of China tensionsTaiwanese fishermen in sensitive waters around frontline islands near the Chinese coast say they are worried about rising tensions, after two Chinese nationals died during a chase with Taiwan's coast guard. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 09:02:55 GMT UXJ4Z36N7NJNFJN4RSJC3VIRLE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/frontline-taiwan-islands-fishermen-wary-china-tensions-2024-02-21/Ann Wang, Walid Berrazeg世界亚太地区
